channel.title: Dedicated server
channel.description:
Ok so im looking into some of them, but im confused as to how it would work.
and what kind do i need to get, i want to be able to have atleast 60 people on at a time.
please respond, any feedback would greatly help =)

item.title: Dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Dedicated servers, are just top of the line computers with no processes in it used to host servers.

very simple.
i have one myself.
(my laptop)
its 100% customized with its on modem and ofcourse its portable.

^^ whats your msn i can host for you for like a month or so so free i can hold 160 players without lag, its more of a vps server. ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:

[quote=“filth scape, post:1, topic:226594”][quote author=pwnedurmom link=topic=297760.msg2392628#msg2392628 date=1219016887]
Ok so im looking into some of them, but im confused as to how it would work.

and what kind do i need to get, i want to be able to have atleast 60 people on at a time.

please respond, any feedback would greatly help =)
[/quote]

Lmao, I can get 60 people on no lag and I don’t have a dedi. Ur comp must suck.

On a different note, IDK about dedis :D[/quote]

well i didn’t spend much $$ on this computer.
512MB
120GB

came with NVIDA GeForce, so idc.

ohh, and it’s vista. =S

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:2, topic:226591”]60 people on at a time.
You would change that in your files?

Also, i don’t know how it works, although i’m sure someone will say soon.
I’ll be watching too :P[/quote]
hosting on my computer i get to 52 people till it’s ungodly lag.

i want a dedi for less lag and 100% uptime. and yeah i have it set to 100 players max in my server atm.

Read full topic
